EmailTemplate.subject: Is your network lagging on customer experience?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Eliminate network lag and latency With real-time video and gaming traffic increasing, how much does peering contribute to lag and latency in your network? Read our guide <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/is-your-network-lagging?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001ea&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=network-lagging-article&utm_term=peering-initial]]> to find out how automated peering can increase your network's performance.
